LanguageData.RV2R_GoalFinish_Drain.label: 完成捕食目标

RV2R_GoalFinish_Drain.rulePack.rulesStri.li: RV2_goalFinish_desc_sentence->[PREY_definite]在[PREDATOR_definite]体内完全失去了方向感，分不清上下左右
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sentence->[PREDATOR_possessive]身体为适应[PREY_definite]而产生扭曲，[PREDATOR_definite]愉快地活动着这处隆起
RV2_goalFinish_init->[PREY_definite]明知会发生什么，还是进入了[PREDATOR_definite]体内
RV2_goalFinish_desc_capacity->[PREDATOR_definite]几乎将[PREY_definite]压扁，[PREY_pronoun]赖以生存的空气全被污浊地排出
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sound->[PREY_definite]竖起耳朵，等待着被释放的时刻
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sound->[PREY_definite]勉强能听见周围机器的运转声
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sound->[PREDATOR_definite]体外似乎传来火药爆炸的声音
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sound->周围笼罩着诡异的寂静
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sound->体内回荡着震耳欲聋的冲击
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREY_definite]被遮蔽光线的肉壁包围，陷入完全的黑暗
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREY_definite]能隐约看见微光透过捕食者的肉壁照射进来
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREDATOR_possessive]肉体某处发出异常光亮，为[PREY_definite]提供了勉强可见的光线
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREY_definite]发现了其他猎物在[PREDATOR_definite]体内存在的痕迹
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREY_definite]发现了[PREDATOR_definite]昔日猎物试图逃脱的痕迹
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREY_definite]周围仅存的空间几乎全被液体填满
RV2_goalFinish_desc_sight->[PREY_definite]周围的一切都覆盖着薄薄一层液体

LanguageData.RV2R_VoreExit_OralDrain.label: 捕食行为结束
LanguageData.RV2R_VoreExit_AnalDrain.label:
捕食行为结束
circumstance_phrase->毫无悔意地
circumstance_phrase->在冷酷的效率中
circumstance_phrase->带着狂热的势头
circumstance_phrase->以迅捷机械的动作
circumstance_phrase->仿佛毫无情感波动
circumstance_phrase->迫于无奈的理由
circumstance_phrase->犹豫不决地颤抖着
circumstance_phrase->以囫囵吞枣的方式

tale_noun->[RV2_exit_tale_noun]

image->[RV2_exit_image]
RV2_exit_desc_sentence->[PREDATOR_definite]正在为下一个猎物做准备
RV2_exit_desc_sentence->[PREDATOR_definite]找到了更好的猎物
desc_sentence(p=2)->[RV2_exit_desc_sentence]
RV2_exit_predVerb->排出
RV2_exit_preyVerb->排出
